column4: Hello. Urgent question: Install is sitting at "installing the base system" for like 10 mins at 31%.  DO I NEED to reburn a new disc?
perhaps run disk test from disk boot menu?
k
Normally, 5-10 minute pauses is NOT OKAY, right???
that way you can test disk and iso you burnt also
what's disk test command
boot from cd it in main menu, check disk or somthing, it will test all files needed to install
not work
if test passes, and install crashes, possible hardware/settings problem
brand new disk
It's a "box" that ran kanotix flawlessly.  I've just put in brand new HDD thought
what dont work?
It locks up.
during install
I know the hardware. Kanotix SUCKS (support especially).  I want syntax for media check
new disk could have error still - the cd itself or image you got from net, cd boot menu test will find out.
what's syntax for that?
okay, EVERYONE, what is syntax for media check at install?
syntax for that?
it's an Aptiva box, with a new Hitachi Deskstar drive in it.
you CANT miss it, its in the main menu!!.... oh, hold on... is that a dapper only feature people? i forget the breezy install cd?
